statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.EmployeeID
, EE.EmployeeNo , EE.EmployeeName , EE.UseYn , EE.PersonID
, BB.PersonType , BB.PersonName , BB.EngName , BB.Email , BB.PhoneNo1 , BB.PhoneNo2 , BB.FaxNo , BB.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrandManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TPerson BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON EE.PersonID = BB.ID WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.EmployeeID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, EE.EmployeeName
FROM dbo.TBrandManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandManager ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BrandID, EmployeeID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BrandID#, #EmployeeID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandManager SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.EmployeeID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TBrandManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate= #StartDate#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.EmployeeID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TBrandManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM dbo.TBrandManager WHERE BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.EmployeeID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TBrandManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM dbo.TBrandManager WHERE BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
